buses.description: List of bus peripherals, which can be used by more than one external device

pins.description: List of available pins on the SoC

anyOf.description: A simple function that doesn't have explicit signal pins, e.g., `gpio`, `pwm`
A function that is associated with a specific peripheral and signal, e.g., `uart0.txd`

name.description: Name of the pin or pad (e.g., `GPIO0`, `PB2`)

pinmux.description:
List of functions that the pin can perform

Can be names constructed with the format `<peripheral>.<signal>` (e.g.,
`uart0.txd`, `i2c0.sda`) or just the function name (e.g., `gpio`, `pwm`).
